com.mr_apps.androidbase.tutorial

Class BaseTutorialActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • AppCompatActivity
      • com.mr_apps.androidbase.tutorial.BaseTutorialActivity

  • public abstract class BaseTutorialActivity
extends AppCompatActivity
    Base abstract activity that should be extended to create a tutorial for an application

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • styleViews

        public abstract void styleViews(android.widget.RelativeLayout background,
              ViewPager pager,
              CirclePageIndicator indicator,
              AppCompatButton skip,
              AppCompatButton login)
        Abstract method that should be override by the subclasses to style all the views of the tutorial
        Parameters:
        background - the layout of the background
        pager - the view pager
        indicator - the view pager indicator
        skip - the button "skip" to skip the turorial
        login - the "login" button to show at the end of the tutorial

      • login

        public abstract void login()
        Abstract method that should be override by the subclasses to manage the actions to do on "login" button tapped

      • getTutorials

        public abstract ItemTutorial[] getTutorials()
        Abstract method that should be override by the subclasses to gets all the items of this tutorial
        Returns:
        an array containing all the items of the tutorial
